00016 #ifndef __CTIMESTAMPEDVALUE_H
00017 #define __CTIMESTAMPEDVALUE_H
00018 
00019 #include "clistener.h"  // simsignal_t
00020 #include "simtime_t.h"
00021 #include "cobject.h"
00022 
00023 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00024 
00025 
00035 class SIM_API cITimestampedValue
00036 {
00037     public:
00038         enum Type {UNDEF, LONG, ULONG, DOUBLE, SIMTIME, STRING, OBJECT};
00039 
00040     public:
00042         virtual ~cITimestampedValue() {}
00043 
00045         virtual simtime_t_cref getTimestamp(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00046 
00048         virtual Type getValueType(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00049 
00052         virtual long longValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00053         virtual unsigned long unsignedLongValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00054         virtual double doubleValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00055         virtual SimTime simtimeValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00056         virtual const char *stringValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00057         virtual cObject *objectValue(simsignal_t signalID) const = 0;
00059 };
00060 
00066 class SIM_API cTimestampedValue : public cITimestampedValue, public cObject
00067 {
00068     public:
00069         simtime_t timestamp;
00070         Type type; // selector for the union
00071         union {
00072             long l;
00073             unsigned long ul;
00074             double d;
00075             const char *s;
00076             cObject *obj;
00077         };
00078         SimTime t;  // cannot go into the union because it has a ctor
00079 
00080     public:
00083         cTimestampedValue() {type=UNDEF;}
00084         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, long l) {set(timestamp,l);}
00085         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, unsigned long ul) {set(timestamp,ul);}
00086         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, double d) {set(timestamp,d);}
00087         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, const SimTime& t) {set(timestamp,t);}
00088         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, const char *s) {set(timestamp,s);}
00089         cTimestampedValue(simtime_t timestamp, cObject *obj) {set(timestamp,obj);}
00091 
00094         void set(simtime_t timestamp, long l) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=LONG; this->l=l;}
00095         void set(simtime_t timestamp, unsigned long ul) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=ULONG; this->ul=ul;}
00096         void set(simtime_t timestamp, double d) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=DOUBLE; this->d=d;}
00097         void set(simtime_t timestamp, const SimTime& t) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=SIMTIME; this->t=t;}
00098         void set(simtime_t timestamp, const char *s) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=STRING; this->s=s;}
00099         void set(simtime_t timestamp, cObject *obj) {this->timestamp=timestamp; type=OBJECT; this->obj=obj;}
00101 
00103         virtual simtime_t_cref getTimestamp(simsignal_t signalID) const {return timestamp;}
00104 
00106         virtual Type getValueType(simsignal_t signalID) const {return type;}
00107 
00110         virtual long longValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return l;}
00111         virtual unsigned long unsignedLongValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return ul;}
00112         virtual double doubleValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return d;}
00113         virtual SimTime simtimeValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return t;}
00114         virtual const char *stringValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return s;}
00115         virtual cObject *objectValue(simsignal_t signalID) const {return obj;}
00117 };
